test.js(2,17): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
test.js(2,28): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== test.js (2 errors) ====
    /**
     * @typedef {(a: string, b: number) => void} Foo
                    ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
                               ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
     */
    
    class C {
        /** @type {Foo} */
        foo(a, b) {}
    
        /** @type {(optional?) => void} */
        methodWithOptionalParameters() {}
    }
